review: This was shipped quickly and brand new just like ad said. My 2 star rating is regarding the product itself. I already had a roku 3 and thought I would get this for my kids room since we recently got rid of cable all together. This thing is so slow compared to the roku 3. Not only does it take like 5 minutes to completely boot up and load everything but even then it's still extremely laggy compared to the roku 3. To me this thing is only worth about $10 max. I am going to throw this away and just go get another roku 3. Don't waste ur time and money.
